Traits.Name: Aura of Fear
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Bogeyman must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Shapeshifter
Traits.Content: The Bogeyman can change its appearance as per the disguise self spell at will, allowing it to blend into nightmares and fears.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Bogeyman is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: minor illusion, dancing lights, fear. 3/day each: darkness, invisibility, nightmare, phantasmal killer.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the Bogeyman fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Bogeyman makes two attacks with Nightmarish Grasp and one attack with Haunting Strike.

Actions.Name: Nightmarish Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +12 to hit, dealing 12 (2d10 + 2) psychic damage. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Haunting Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +12 to hit, dealing 19 (3d10 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it becomes poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Terrorizing Visions
Actions.Content: The Bogeyman manifests a horrifying illusion in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within range must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 39 (7d10) psychic damage, or half as much on a successful save, and be frightened until the end of its next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Whispers of the Void Legendary Action 1 (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Bogeyman can emit haunting whispers that surround a single creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Shadowy Terror Legendary Action 2 (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Bogeyman can choose to use Terrorizing Visions.

LegendaryActions.Name: Maddening Haunt Legendary Action 3 (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Bogeyman releases a pulse of dark energy in a 20-foot radius. Each creature of its choice must succeed on a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 39 (7d10) necrotic damage and have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened until the end of its next turn.
